title: OCE SERVER fix your BAN system ASAP
body:
v READ ALL OF THIS PLEASE v 

hey guys so i just wanna ask if OCE SERVER give out smaller bans or even a chat ban for swearing as words are not harmful to players. 
i just wanna say that i have been playing league from S1 and i can say that NA was a much better contender at giving consequences than OCE. 
firstly playing on NA i would.. yes swear alot in my games because of my teammates not contributing to the team in norms and ranked. i received atleast 3 mute bans (5 chat bans per game for 5 games X3) after that it was a 1 day ban and that was 4-5 years ago. Now OCE just 2 days ago i got a 14 day ban for swearing in 1 game (normz game) (14day ban) now i can say that this is on the extreme level of consequence as in 4 years of playing i did not get 1 ban and i have done worse then what i did to receive that 14 day ban. so for the whole community to agree we would love to see chat bans come to OCE from NA as they were much better then giving a freaking 14 DAY BAN ON JUST TALKING IN A BAD WAY. 

giving a perma ban is not the best option is shouldnt even be consided as a thing if your swearing/talking to people in  A GAME just give the people who are rude LIKE ME A CHAT BAN as this is the best option out of a 14 day ban so please riot OCE step your game up and give chat bans as you soonly will find out that everyone will stop playing your game if you dont act on your banning system.

replies.body: People literally say 'kys' (or the non-acronym equivalent) which is generally an instant ban on NA as soon as someone reports them (reporting players trigger the review). If I report someone on OCE for saying it, nothing happens. In the last month I've reported a handful of people who have said it, and I haven't had a single feedback report.

it is one of the auto trigger words, but yes in the past few days it seems to be not working again or something.

Riot OCE is a bit schizophrenic when it comes to this stuff.
The thing is, there are 'blacklisted' words that will get you banned, but each server has its own list (it's why we can say c*nt on this server and nobody bats an eye).

i dont think i have ever said kys in any game i have had. but yes that would literally f*** someone up in real life if they had depression or some shit like that it really depends on the day i guess like 1 day i could feel happy and want to win a game and another day i just play for fun and if i lose then ill lose dont care. but yes on NA it depends what server your in that seems to have the insta ban rule

IDK, I shit-talk all the time, I never get banned for it.
Maybe I just understand where to draw the line?
